com.soen6441.core.effect

类 MotivateEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen6441.core.effect.Effect
      • com.soen6441.core.effect.MotivateEffect
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TimerListener

    public class MotivateEffect
extends Effect
    This is a kind of special effect on Tower. By adding this effect to a Tower object, to enhance the properties of the tower object.
    作者:
    Haiyang Sun
    另请参阅:
    Effect, MapItem, Tower

      • strongerThan

        public boolean strongerThan(Effect effect)
        Check if the existing same kind of Effect is stronger than this one.
        覆盖:
        strongerThan 在类中 Effect
        参数:
        effect - Another effect, which should be same type as this one.
        返回:
        true if this effect is stronger, false if the effect in the para is stronger or they are imcomparable.
        另请参阅:
        Effect.strongerThan(Effect)
